messages.message:
seeing some flaky failures for the following:
• `field-editor` and `nested-field-editor` — both are failing because it’s not getting the expected `setRecords` calls but their root causes seem to be different.
    ◦ here (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/12583/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1), here (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/12578/overview/245b5b64-f914-426a-8bce-0c9e0858b81f?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1), here (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/12573/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1), and here (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/12574/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1)
• `converse-app`  — looks like doc uploads are timing out
    ◦ here (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/12573/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1) and here (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/12582/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1)

so anytime i see this flaky error, i also notice that the image never loaded. I think the sandbox just is slow and the button click doesn't register as a result of things loading and state changing in the background.

So idk what the solution here is? Maybe add a longer wait?
interesting, in the first link for `field-editor` it seemed to me that the issue was because of switching focus from input to the “clear” button and that causing the click to actually not go through
ouh i see, yah hm. Ok I'll try just clicking clear after it unfocuses then
